sections.heading: district; provide information.A school district shall make information about the school district and its schools, programs, policies, and procedures available to all interested people

sections.text:
79-243.School district; provide information.

A school district shall make information about the school district and its schools, programs, policies, and procedures available to all interested people.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 183, § 13;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-3413;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 47.
